props.name: size
props.description: Sets a static size for the button, which scales padding and text size. {small, medium, large}

props.name: responsiveSize
props.description:
Render a specific button size at a specific breakpoint. Takes precedence over size and fullWidth.
Format is size@breakpoint (ex: large@sm).

props.name: iconOnly
props.description: Renders an icon-only button. Default slot is disabled. Overrides size and responsiveSize props.

props.name: onDark
props.description:
Renders an icon-only button with a light fill color for use on dark backgrounds.
iconOnly must be true.

slots.name: default
slots.description: innerHTML on the inside of the button component
